section.title: Overview
section.p: To define the project content for a IBundleMakerProject, you have to retrieve and manipulate the associated IBundleMakerProjectDescription. Each bundlemaker project contains exactly one project description, as shown in the illustration above:

section.title: Retrieving the project description
Adding content to the project description
section.p:
The IBundleMakerProjectDescription interface contains a bunch of methods that can be used to add content
Resource content contains the resources that you want to be analyzed and manipulated. E.g. if you want to transform a simple JAR archive into an OSGi bundle or some source code in valid PDE project, you have to add them to the project description as resource content.
